Articles.Content:
Hi there.

I've been away for a few months and am just now coming back to KSP, and making videos.

I was wondering if anyone could some beautification mods that look good on an EVA scale. (That is close up on a Kerbal, who's not in a vessel) So not EVE, or Orbital Enhancement, there was also a texture compression mod, though I can't remember the name, if anyone could point me to that I would be grateful. 

 Also has anyone made an FOV slider mod?

The texture compression mod is likely [Active Texture Management](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005).

FOV adjustment is a stock feature, hold alt while using the scrollwheel.
Mod question moved to the mod subforums.
